sen.j: 平安騎馬隊（へいあんきばたい）は京都府警察の騎馬隊である。
sen.e: Heian cavalry (Heian Kibatai) is the cavalry of the Kyoto Prefectural Police).
Heian cavalry (Heian Kibatai) is the cavalry of the Kyoto Prefectural Police).
Heian cavalry (Heian Kibatai) is the cavalry of the Kyoto Prefectural Police.

sen.j: 1994年に平安京遷都1200年を記念して創設された。
sen.e: It was founded to commemorate the 1200th anniversary of the relocation of the capital to Heian-kyo (ancient Kyoto).
It was founded to commemorate the 1200th anniversary of the relocation of the capital to Heian-kyo (ancient Kyoto).
It was founded in 1994 to commemorate the 1200th anniversary of the relocation of the capital to Heian-kyo (ancient Kyoto).

sen.j: 当時の京都府警察に騎馬警官が配置される。
sen.e: Mounted police officers were deployed at the Kyoto Prefectural Police.
Mounted police officers were deployed at the Kyoto Prefectural Police Department.
Mounted police officers were deployed at the Kyoto Prefectural Police Department.

sen.j: しかし1945年以降10年内に消滅。
sen.e: However, they disappeared in the 10 years after 1945.
However, they disappeared 10 years after 1945.
However, they disappeared 10 years after 1945.

sen.j: - 2月10日に平安騎馬隊が創設。
sen.e: On February 10th, the Hean Cavalry was founded
On February 10th, the Hean Cavalry was founded
On February 10, the Hean Cavalry was founded

sen.j: 当時は京都競馬場を活動拠点としていた。
sen.e: At first the Kyoto racetrack was its main base of activity.
At first the Kyoto racetrack was its main base of activity.
At first the Kyoto racetrack was its main base of activity.

sen.j: 宝ヶ池公園憩いの森内に施設が整備され10月から活動拠点を移動した。
sen.e: The facilities for the Heian cavalry were constructed in the Ikoi no Mori ("forest of relaxation") of Takaragaike Park, moving its base there.
The facilities for the Heian cavalry were constructed in the Ikoi no Mori ("forest of relaxation") of Takaragaike Park, moving its base there.
The facilities for the Heian cavalry were constructed in the Ikoi no Mori (forest of relaxation) of Takaragaike Park, moving its base there in October.

tit.e: Main horses belonging to the Heian cavalry
Main horses belonging to the Heian cavalry
Main horses belonging to the Heian cavalry

sen.j: 所属馬は元競走馬だったサラブレッドが多い。
sen.e: Many of the horses belonging to the Heian cavalry were thoroughbreds which were ex-race horses.
Many of the horses belonging to the Heian cavalry were thoroughbreds that were ex-race horses.
Many of the horses belonging to the Heian cavalry were thoroughbreds that were ex-race horses.

sen.j: 馬名は京都の地名等から取られている。
sen.e: The names of horses are taken from the names of locations in Kyoto.
The names of the horses were taken from the names of locations in Kyoto.
The names of the horses were taken from the names of locations in Kyoto.

sen.e: Kasagi
Kasagi
Kasagi

sen.e: The old name is Biko Alpha.
The old name is Biko Alpha.
The old name is Biko Alpha.

sen.j: 牡、馬の毛色黒鹿毛。
sen.e: The horse is male and its hair color is dark bay.
The horse is male and its hair color is dark bay.
The horse is male and its hair color is dark bay.

sen.j: 父リヴリア、母クリレモン、母の父インディアナ。
sen.e: His father is Rivlia, his mother is Kuriremon, and his mother's father is Indiana.
His father was Rivlia, his mother was Kuriremon, and his mother's father was Indiana.
His father was Rivlia, his mother was Kuriremon, and his mother's father was Indiana.

sen.j: 1990年4月24日、北海道の長谷川牧場で生まれる。
sen.e: He was born on April 24th in 1990 at the Hasegawa farm in Hokkaido.
He was born April 24th in 1990 at the Hasegawa farm in Hokkaido.
He was born April 24, 1990 at the Hasegawa farm in Hokkaido.

sen.j: 日本中央競馬会の鹿戸幸治厩舎に所属していた元日本の競馬の競走体系競走条件区分で、オープン特別時代の富士ステークスに優勝しているほか、京王杯スプリングカップ2着、京成杯オータムハンデキャップ2着など、重賞でも好走を見せていた。
sen.e: In the division of competitive condition in the former competition system of Japanese horseracing which belonged to the Yukiharu SHIKATO stable of the Japan Racing Association, he won the Fuji Stakes of Open Tokubetsu Jidai and ran well in big prize horse races, with a 2nd rank in the Keio Hai Spring Cup and the 2nd rank in the Keisei Hai Autumn Handicap.

In the former competitive system of Japanese horseracing and belonging to the Yukiharu SHIKATO stable of the Japan Racing Association, he won the Fuji Stakes of the Open Tokubetsu Jidai and ran well in big prize horse races, ranked 2nd in the Keio Hai Spring Cup and came in 2nd in the Keisei Hai Autumn Handicap.

In the former competitive system of Japanese horseracing and belonging to the Yukiharu SHIKATO stable of the Japan Racing Association, he won the Fuji Stakes of the Open Tokubetsu Jidai and ran well in big prize horse races, ranked 2nd in the Keio Hai Spring Cup and came in 2nd in the Keisei Hai Autumn Handicap.

sen.j: 競走馬としての通算成績は58戦7勝。
sen.e: His record as a racehorse was 7 wins out of 58 races.
His record as a racehorse was 7 wins out of 58 races.
His record as a racehorse was 7 wins out of 58 races.

sen.j: その引退後は阪神競馬場で誘導馬となった。
sen.e: After retiring, he became a lead horse at the Hanshin racetrack.
After retiring, he became the lead horse at the Hanshin racetrack.
After retiring, he became the lead horse at the Hanshin racetrack.

sen.j: 2007年7月に誘導馬を引退し、笠置と改名して騎馬隊に入隊した。
sen.e: In July 2007 he retired from as a lead horse and changed his name into Kasachi and joined the cavalry.
In July 2007 he retired from being a lead horse and changed his name to Kasachi and joined the cavalry.
In July 2007 he retired from being a lead horse and changed his name to Kasachi and joined the cavalry.
